channel.title: How to i upgrade cache 317 to 602 or 625 cache?
channel.description: the title says it all for a PI source anyone know?

item.title: How to i upgrade cache 317 to 602 or 625 cache?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Dextrell:

the title says it all for a PI source anyone know?

  1. Project Insanity is a server source. It has nothing to do with client-side modifications.
  2. There is no easy way. You’re going to have to research the way the cache for those revisions is structured, and replace the structure from the 317 cache with that one.
  3. You’ll also need to change how the models are rendered, how the user interacts with the game, etc.

tl;dr it’s more work than you’re probably capable of, and more than likely willing to do.

Read full topic
item.source: How to i upgrade cache 317 to 602 or 625 cache?
